title: 89/450/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 July 1989 amending for the fifth time Decision 82/351/EEC recognizing certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany as being officially swine-fever-free (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 18 July 1989
amending for the fifth time Decision 82/351/EEC recognizing certain parts of the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany as being officially swine-fever-free
(Only the German text is authentic)
(89/450/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following regions are added to the list laid down in Article 1 of Decision 82/351/EEC:
- Muenster,
- Rheinhessen-Pfalz.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
